name: Neha M
about: CSE (AI & ML) Student | Aspiring Algorithm Trader | AI & ML Enthusiast  Currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science (AI & ML) at Dayananda Sagar University.  Passionate about leveraging artificial intelligence and machine learning in trading, finance, and autonomous systems. I have hands-on experience with projects like Lunar Rovers, Augmented Reality Navigation, and I am always eager to explore cutting-edge technologies. Achievements include receiving a scholarship from the Reliance Foundation.  As the Event and Student Relations Manager at DSU's E-Cell, I guide startup companies and contribute to fostering innovation.  I am particularly interested in roles that combine AI, ML, and finance, including algorithmic trading and investment banking. I am driven to solve complex challenges and continuously expand my skill set.  Let’s connect to explore opportunities and share ideas.

name: Omkar Srivastava
about: As an experienced Engineering Manager (a thought leader and people-centric), I bring a diverse skill set and a proven track record of leading successful software projects. With over 12 years of experience in the industry, I have honed my expertise in various domains, including banking, telecom, healthcare, and compliance.  My technical proficiency spans a wide range of technologies, including Azure, CI/CD, Automation, Python, Java, C#, Robot Framework, Static Analysis, Design Patterns, Release Management, and more. I have a strong background in development, having worked on projects using Java, C#, and Python.  I am passionate about empowering my team and fostering a collaborative work environment. My leadership skills have been honed through managing teams across different geographies and time zones. I am always eager to learn new technologies and share my knowledge with others.  As a proud alumnus of IIM Indore with a 3.59/4.33 CGPA, I bring a strong analytical mindset and a strategic approach to problem-solving. I have experience in requirement analysis, resource management, data analysis, and creating data pipelines using tools like Power BI, MLOps, Ansible, K8s, Docker, Terraform, Hadoop, and Kafka  Throughout my career, I have demonstrated a keen interest in growth strategies and have worked on initiatives such as the "Make Anything" project at Autodesk. I have also contributed to the M365 Core-SCIM Data Retention team at Microsoft, showcasing my ability to work on complex projects and deliver results.  If you have any questions that I can help with, please feel free to reach out here on LinkedIn or via Topmate- Omkar_n_s.  Business Skills: Leadership, Hiring, Mentor, Agile, Software Design, Capacity Planning, Requirements Gathering, Configuration Management, Release management, Conflict Management, Budgeting.  Technical Skills: Azure, DevOps, Python, Java, CICD, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Git, RTC, Artifactory, Kafka, Terraform, PowerBI, SQL, Automation, Windows, Linux.

Build and maintain strong client relationships, gaining deep insights into industry trends and hiring needs to deliver precise talent solutions. Lead the full-cycle recruitment process for mid-to-senior level positions: requirement analysis, job design, search strategy, candidate evaluation, and interview coordination. Establish and optimize talent databases and sourcing channels (LinkedIn, social media, industry networks, direct outreach) to ensure efficiency and quality in candidate search. experiences.description: During my internship at Hindustan Aeronautics Limited in the MCSRDC division, I worked on a project focused on Digital Image Compression Using Deep Learning. This experience provided me with practical exposure to advanced machine learning techniques and their application in image processing.  Key Responsibilities:  • Developed a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) model aimed at enhancing image compression while preserving high visual quality.  • Implemented the HiFiC (High-Fidelity Image Compression) model to improve traditional compression methods and achieve superior performance.  • Conducted data preprocessing, including resizing and normalization, to prepare a diverse dataset of images for model training.  • Evaluated model performance using key metrics such as Peak Signal-to-Noise Ratio (PSNR) and Structural Similarity Index (SSIM), ensuring effective compression without significant quality loss.  • Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to troubleshoot model issues, optimizing performance and gaining valuable insights into real-world AI applications.  Impact:  This internship allowed me to bridge theoretical knowledge with practical skills in deep learning and image processing. The hands-on experience significantly enhanced my understanding of AI technologies, preparing me for future challenges in the field. During my internship at Hindustan Aeronautics Limited in the MCSRDC division, I worked on a project focused on Digital Image Compression Using Deep Learning. about: Full Stack Developer with over 4.8 years of hands-on experience building scalable web applications and services in the Information Technology and Services industry. I have a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and modern UI frameworks like Material UI and Bootstrap, allowing me to create responsive and intuitive user interfaces. My experience includes integrating complex systems, working with cloud platforms, and collaborating in Agile teams to deliver high-quality products on time.  I hold a Master of Computer Applications (MCA) in Information Technology from G.L. about: A possible rewritten summary is:  As a Graphic Designer, I collaborate with clients to create visually compelling and market-ready assets that meet their needs and resonate with their target audience. I execute projects from concept to completion, incorporating client feedback and using multimedia design tools.  With a BA in Graphic Design from Middlesex University and three years of work experience in various design roles, I have developed a diverse portfolio of branding, packaging, illustration, UX, interaction, layout, experience, motion, and 3D design. I am a proactive and detail-oriented designer, with an unrelenting quest for innovation and expansion, and a keen awareness of digital trends.

Our study demonstrates the power of machine learning algorithms like Random Forest, Decision Tree, and SVM in analyzing voice markers for Parkinson's disease diagnosis. The Random Forest model achieved an impressive accuracy of 94.12%, showcasing the immense potential of these technologies to revolutionize early disease detection and improve clinical decision-making. name: Sagar Das
about: Hi, I'm Sagar Das, a seasoned Machine Learning Engineer with a passion for building innovative solutions that drive business impact. With a strong background in natural language processing, deep learning, and data science, I've developed a unique expertise in designing and deploying AI-powered systems that solve real-world problems.  Currently, I'm leading the charge as a Machine Learning Engineer at CrimeCheck, where I'm driving the development of cutting-edge models that enhance the accuracy and efficiency of our background verification reports. My expertise spans machine learning techniques, including KNN, Naive Bayes, Regression, SVM, Decision Tree, Ensemble Models, and Deep Learning techniques like CNN, Encoder-Decoder, LSTM, Attention Models, BERT, and RAG.  I'm also excited to be at the forefront of Generative AI, with expertise in Large Language Models (LLMs) using RAG, LLaMA, and Qlora. I'm always looking to collaborate with like-minded professionals who share my passion for AI innovation and making a meaningful impact.  Let's connect and explore opportunities to drive AI-driven growth and innovation together! …see more
